parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel tank quick disconnect can cause gasoline to leak from the bike, creating a fire hazard and potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: wetness on the leg or body
fuel dripping onto the engine and exhaust.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the integral ABS pressure modulator can cause complete brake/ABS failure, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially in high-traffic areas or tight turns.
symptoms: inability to stop or slow down

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Crankshaft Connector Rod Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft connector rod can cause sudden engine failure, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: followed by a large amount of smoke and oil pouring from the bottom of the motor. The connector rod may be hanging out of a hole in the engine casing.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling due to Throttle Closure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities, especially when occurring at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The engine stalls unexpectedly when closing the throttle to slow down
such as when approaching a stop signal or making a turn. The motorcycle may bog down when approaching a stop
even with the clutch fully pulled in.
